channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gap in path from utilty ground works, 29th July
item.description:
Poor groundwork from unsealed path has an uneven gap. Location is just by lamp No.9 and driveway on Runnymead, up Hatherley, CHELTENHAM. GL513.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Runnymede, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 29th July

item.title: Bicycle in stream, 29th July
item.description:
A damaged bicycle has been left in the stream. Doesn't appear in usable shape, so seems like flytipping versus theft related.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slad Way, Oakley, Cheltenham
